content:
Added a PR for this week's triage: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-perf/pull/1207

Some notes:

  • Thank you @Jakub Ber√°nek for adding the crate categorization (primary and secondary). It definitely makes quick analysis much easier
  • Also awesome to see so many folks in #t-compiler/performance involved in PRs that make the compiler faster. Good work all!
  • On the negative side: all regressions were in rollups - we continue to allow too many regressions in through rollups IMO
@rylev left one comment, feel free to merge with changes to that effect made
Yeah, rollups continue to be an issue. I don't know how we defeat them.
The queue was empty a couple of hours ago. It would probably have been possible to rollup a bit less aggressively.
